content: पीलुः [पील्-उ] {@--1@} An arrow. {@--2@} An atom. {@--3@} An insect. {@--4@} An elephant. {@--5@} The stem of the palm. {@--6@} A flower. {@--7@} A group of palm trees. {@--8@} A kind of tree. {@--9@} A heap of bones. {@--10@} The central part of the hand. --लु {%<ab>n.</ab>%} The fruit of the Pīlu tree
